item.description:
Hi Everyone,

RSVP DEADLINE IS FEB 26th FOR TICKETS AT THIS PRICE

I have scheduled the Whale watch at an amazing $22.50 per ticket. Regular price $45.00. If you sent me a message on the board, please RSVP your request to join. I am setting up online payment, and have to unfortunately charge an additional dollar to cover expenses of using this system.

When you RSVP, please send me an email with your address so I can send you the ticket. I can also hold onto it if you'd like, but please send the email with your basic information so I can clip your name onto the ticket for reserve.

I need a count for the discounted ticket no later than Tuesday, next week. Other's will be able to join in closer to the date, but will have to pay full price.

I have reserved 20 spots at this price, but if it books up with YES, fully paid RSVP's, send me an email and I'll see if I can add you. The person that I spoke to at the Whale Watch place is very flexible, however he said that this special is going to be removed shortly.

If you can do only a CASH payment, email me right away to let me know, and I'll see what I can work out for you. I'd rather you be able to join, than have to worry about how to get the payment in, we can figure that out.

Please let me know if you have any questions, and I'll update you with more details later.

Laura
item.name: Whale Watch
